name: Perspectiva Consultants
goal:
The aim of Perspectiva Consultants is to assist people and organisations with their knowledge and understanding of all aspects of the EU.
The majority of the organisations which Perspectiva Consultants shall work with be private companies and this shall involve working with all aspects of the EU to achieve this.
interests: Business and Industry, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Maritime and ports policy
Transport policy
Trade policy
Construction policy
Brexit policy
Third country policies
